column4: sorry - not actually icons but menus - visual representations of usual menu options in many applications
another thing that may work, is find the icon file on your PC, open it with GIMP and use the resize function to resize the icon, then save, then change the icon using right click/properties
don't really care if the layout is as in Windows or not but just want it smaller..
use Xubuntu, it has the smallest menu icons on the planet...lol
IndyGunFreak> - i would try it but is there a chance that it will screw my ubuntu?
